H705.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H6372.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Eleazar<SDBH:אֶלְעָזָר>}, high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>} during last phase of exodus; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H2030.def: = state in which someone is pregnant

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H3766.def: = process by which humans or animals sink on their knees ◄ as a result of being unable to keep standing up

H6735.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing in the form of an image or a drawing; ► functioning in non-sanctioned rituals or as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H2015.def: = action by which humans turn their body around in order to face a different direction than before

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H5324.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H7896.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H350.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Phinehas<SDBH:פִּינְחָס>}, a {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; brother of {L:Ahitub<SDBH:אֲחִיטוּב>}; ► was born when the {L:ark<SDBH:אֲרֹון>} of the covenant was seized by the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלִשְׁתִּי>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
